menuText:
I am Rafal, and currently have been working as a Senior Front End Developer.

Up till now have worked on many different projects, and in each of them I have used and developed my technical skills in different areas including development, web design and web usability, accessibility, web marketing, management and testing skills.

I am an experienced, University-educated Front End Developer whose objective is to build up my already existing technical skills, whilst working in a team environment. I am passionate about development and always keen to work with the latest technologies against Agile.

Languages

HTML/HTML5, CSS2/3, Sass, Less, BEM, ReactJS, OO Javascript, ES5, ES6, jQuery, Backbone, RaphaelJS, PHP, MySQL

debugging in iOS, Windows, and Android environments.

Mobile Platform

Phone Gap/Cordova

Versioning control systems

Git/GitFlow and SVN

Systems

Linux, Windows, DOS, MacOS

Applications

MS Office, Photoshop, Illustrator, Visual Web Developer, Adobe Flash
